description.translate: Time is incapable of blunting your stone will.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Casque antique\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Le temps est bien incapable\"}","{\"text\":\"§7d'émousser ta volonté de pierre.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Time is incapable of blunting\"}","{\"text\":\"§7your stone will.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a2 §7SPD§a1 §7DAR§c-2\"}"]}}
